head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHIEFFELIN, MARY S.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SCHIEFFELIN, MARY S.

block.p: SCHIEFFELIN-Mary S., 86. Of Cornwall Bridge, CT. died peacefully at home on July 23 after a long illness. Beloved aunt of Julie, Lindsay, and John. Also survived by a great niece, 5 great nephews and many friends. Funeral service Saturday, July 29th, 10AM at the United Church of Christ in Cornwall, 8 Bolton Hill Road, Cornwall, CT. 06753. Memorial contributions may be made to the UCC in Cornwall at the same address.
